course_description: Foundations and problems of machine intelligence, application areas, representation of knowledge, constraint processing, AI programming languages, expert systems, design of an intelligent system.
prerequisites: (CS 224 or CS_OX 224) and CS 253 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
